title: New Creator: Sloppy
body:
Name: Sloppy

Socials -
https://www.twitch.tv/sloppyr6
https://www.youtube.com/c/SloppyR6/featured
https://www.instagram.com/sloppyr6/

Info - Sloppy is a professional Rainbow Six Siege player that uploads content to his 27K subscribers on YouTube and streams on Twitch with over 40K followers. Known for his competitive gameplay and content, Sloppy also has an interest in crypto and specifically the Rally project. Sloppy would be Rally's first Rainbow Six player/streamer. 

Use Cases -
Coin distribution - Twitch live stream, YouTube Video, all socials push
Holding - Discord access, gated roles and channels based on holding amounts 
Transacting - coaching, tournaments, play with me live on stream 

Grant - $1000

A 'yes' approves Sloppy and a $1000 treasury grant
A 'no' denies this prop.
author: 0xa1e4270381e381E75ef6e4dDa1a27337a4Be0939
